comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: This photograph is featured in the Indicommons.org post Don McCullin curates for The Commons. Much as I unabashedly adore the Frith photographs - they always appeal to the part of me that wants to photograph architecture - the man in the background of this one, so wrapped in cloth and turned away, is almost as much statue as the headless statue in the centre of the image, with its oh-so-human left foot. It's a really intriguing image!
